title: McCain on immigration amnesty
author: VD
content_html:
McCrazy can’t stop letting the migrating cat out of the bag:

I haven’t won on every issue. I didn’t win on immigration reform, but I’ll go back at it. And I’m glad I did it.

Just one of the many reasons I wouldn’t even consider voting for John McCain. The truth is, I don’t see how either he or the Magic Negro can win, although presumably one of them has to. I suppose it will be rather like a game between the Miami Dolphins and the San Francisco 49ers; whoever manages to screw up less will win.

I suppose it will be rather like a game between the Miami Dolphins and the San Francisco 49ers; whoever manages to screw up less will win.
